org.expressme.webwind.renderer
Class Renderer

java.lang.Object
  org.expressme.webwind.renderer.Renderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryRenderer, FileRenderer, TemplateRenderer, TextRenderer
public abstract class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object

Renderer object to indicate how to render the http response.

Author:
Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com)

getContentType

public java.lang.String getContentType()
Get response content type.

setContentType

public void setContentType(java.lang.String contentType)
Set response content type, for example, "text/xml". The default content type is "text/html". DO NOT add "charset=xxx".

render

public abstract void render(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Render the output of http response.

Parameters:
context - ServletContext object.
request - HttpServletRequest object.
response - HttpServletResponse object.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If any Exception occur.
